title: THE GYM AND THE POOL R OUTSIDE YOUR DOOR WITH THIS BEAUTIFUL 2B2B APT
posting_body: ['Welcome to Chorus', "Chorus is prominently and conveniently located at the cross point of SF's most dynamic neighborhoods.", 'The private residences are complete with the latest technology and top-of-the-line appliances.', 'Outside the home, Chorus residents enjoy access to a unique collection of amenities including a rooftop pool, outdoor American Ninja Warrior course, solarium, speakeasy and lobby cocktail bar.', 'The community is expertly maintained 24 hours a day by a dedicated team with attention to every detail.', 'Join the Chorus family today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'EV & scooter charging stations', 'Bike Storage & Repair', 'Co-working space with private conference rooms', 'Attended arrival desk', 'Dog run, grooming station and pet wash', 'Valet parking', 'Skybox lounge', 'Backyard terrace with pizza oven', 'Rooftop solarium with floating fireplace, private dining kitchen and skyline views', 'Ninja Warrior course with an 8-foot warped wall and octagon frame', 'Adjacent Chorus Hall 227-seat performing arts venue', 'Speakeasy gaming lounge with skee ball, foosball and arcade favorites', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Check out the virtual tour:', '<URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
